participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Caring and supportive, with a strong focus on family and personal growth.
participant_1.background: my daughter is a child prodigy. i'm a doctor. my favorite movie is friday. i am now looking for a new job. i enjoy going to the park.

participant_2.background: i'm a professional tennis player. i live in a three storey house. i enjoy long walks with my dog. i'm married to a doctor.

content.text: I live in a three storey house.
